Weapon.Name: Echoes of the Forgotten
Weapon.Description: A blade that whispers the tales of a fallen civilization, humming with a mysterious energy.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Casts a silence on the enemy, preventing spell casting for 2 turns.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As the blade cuts through the air, it silences the cries of its foes, drowning them in the quiet of the past.

Weapon.Name: Chrono Staff
Weapon.Description: Wielded by the guardians of time, this staff controls the ebb and flow of battle.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Slows enemy movement by 50% for 3 turns.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The staff's glow brightens, and the world around seems to slow, bending to the will of its master.

Weapon.Name: Harmony Blade
Weapon.Description: A dual-edged sword that balances the essence of light and darkness within each strike.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Restores 5 health to the user on hit.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With each swing, harmony is restored, sapping the chaos from foes to mend the wielder's wounds.
